articles.description: When Manchester United and Tottenham face off it will be the sixth all-English final in a major European competition - with half of them involving Spurs.
articles.title: Man Utd v Tottenham in Europea League final: All-English final in Bilbao with Champions League on line

articles.description: Ange Postecoglou took aim at Tottenham's critics after they reached the Europa League final as he remains on course to continue his record of wining a trophy in his second season.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou: Tottenham boss hits back at critics as Spurs reach Europa League final

articles.description: Abde Ezzalzouli smashed home minutes into extra time to send Real Betis into the Europa Conference League final at the expense of two-time finalists Fiorentina.
articles.title: Fiorentina 3-4 Betis (AET): Ezzalzouli fires Betis to first European final

articles.description: Chelsea manager Enzo Maresca says he is excited to face his "professional dad"  after Manuel Pellegrini-managed Real Betis qualified for the Conference League final.
articles.title: Chelsea: Enzo Maresca excited to face 'football dad' in Conference League final

articles.description: The Pakistan Super League is considering postponing the remainder of its season amid the ongoing tensions between India and Pakistan.
articles.title: Pakistan Super League: Organisers considering postponing the remainder of season amid India-Pakistan tensions

articles.description: Los Angeles will become the first city to incorporate two stadiums into an Olympics opening ceremony when it hosts the Games in 2028.
articles.title: LA28: Los Angeles to host 2028 Olympic Games opening ceremony in two stadiums

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on grime stars Footsie and Strategy with his predictions for this weekend's Premier League fixtures.
articles.title: Premier League predictions: Chris Sutton v grime stars Footsie & Strategy

articles.description: The numbers in the squad and why Wales can take hope from history as the Lions class of 2025 is revealed.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions squad: How the 38 players stack up

articles.description: Defending champion Iga Swiatek cruises through to the Italian Open third round with a straight-set win over Elisabetta Cocciaretto.
articles.title: Italian Open: Iga Swiatek beats Elisabetta Cocciaretto to reach third round

articles.description: Luke Humphries beat Luke Littler 6-5 to win his first Premier League night in 10 weeks at Leeds' First Direct Arena.
articles.title: Premier League Darts results: Luke Humphries beats Luke Littler in Leeds final
